Review of Mattermost Interoperability Characteristics

GET/POST APIs with Mattermost

  • Mattermost provides a number of GET/POST APIs which can we used by clients and third party applications to interact with the server. These APIs are collectively called as Mattermost Web Services API.
  • Mattermost also allows developers to create bots.

1. How can we achieve calling (custom GET/POST)APIs?

  • we can call any of the APIs by hitting the endpoint and passing the required parameters along with credentials for authentication.
  • There are a number of endpoints provided by Mattermost to achieve different functionalities. a detailed description of all the available endpoints can be found here: https://api.mattermost.com/#tag/introduction
  • Introduction to creating some sample bots can be found here.

2. What resources are required for producing or providing it?

  • We should have correct level of access on the platform to be able to call the APIs.
  • The REST APIs provided by Mattermost are available out of the box.
  • A detailed description of all the available endpoints can be found here: https://api.mattermost.com/#tag/introduction

3. Are there any standards surrounding the product that we have to follow?

  • we must adhere to security and regulation guidelines.here.
